ValidationRule.description: Ensures that the home phone field is properly validated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: IF( OR(ISCHANGED(HomePhone) && NOT(ISNULL(HomePhone)) && NOT(ISBLANK(HomePhone)) && !REGEX(HomePhone ,'^\\d{10,25}$'), ISNEW() && NOT(ISNULL(HomePhone)) && NOT(ISBLANK(HomePhone)) && !REGEX(HomePhone ,'^\\d{10,25}$')),true,false)
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Invalid format entered for home phone. The minimum number of digits should be 10.
